summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TON City Builder MVP. Backend APIs mostly functional (83.3% success rate) with MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues. Frontend loads correctly with proper authentication flow and responsive design.

critical_bugs.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error causing 520 Internal Server Error
critical_bugs.impact: Some plot coordinate requests fail intermittently
critical_bugs.error_details: ValueError: [TypeError("'ObjectId' object is not iterable"), TypeError('vars() argument must have __dict__ attribute')]

passed_tests: Landing page loads correctly with Connect Wallet button
Business types display correctly with icons
Authentication flow redirects properly without wallet
Responsive design adapts to mobile viewport
Price calculation formula works correctly (center=100 TON, edge=10 TON)
All business types present (farm, factory, shop, power_plant, bank, restaurant)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue in plot coordinate endpoints. The error occurs when MongoDB documents contain ObjectId fields that cannot be JSON serialized. Need to ensure all database queries exclude '_id' field or convert ObjectId to string.
